issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
While testing KS I noticed that a screen with 4 rows appears after some redrawing, and I can bring a search bar not only by pressing show button, but also by scrolling down the screen.

Not a regression, appears in 2.0.2

Test steps
1. Run KS
2. Navigate to Base UI>Views>Table Views>Table Search
3. Scroll down the screen 

Actual result:
An ability to bring a search bar by scrolling down the screen

Expected result:
Ability to bring a search bar by pressing a show button
fields.summary: iOS: Views - Ability to bring a search bar not only by pressing a Show button, but also by scrolling down the screen
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.0.201206121914
Titanium SDK: 2.1.0.v20120612170248
Device: iPhone 4S 5.0.1

comments.body:
Failed on:
Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.1.201207161421
Titanium SDK, build: 2.1.1.v20120718121609
Device: iPad 5.1

Comment:
Search bar disappeared when changing orientation of the device.

Issue reproduces 

Tested with

Titanium Studio, build: 3.0.1.201212181159
Titanium SDK version: 3.1.0 
Titanium SDK version: 3.0.2 
iOS iPhone Simulator: iOS SDK version: 6.0
Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
